org.svvrl.goal.cmd
Interface Expression

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractExpression, AccCommand, AlphabetCommand, AperiodicCommand, BatchCommand, BinaryExpr, ClassificationCommand, CloneCommand, CloseCommand, CommandExpression, ComplementExpression, ConcatenationCommand, Constant, ContainmentCommand, ConvertCommand, DeterministicCommand, DeterminizationCommand, EchoCommand, EmptinessCommand, EquivalenceCommand, GenerateCommand, HomomorphismCommand, InputTestCommand, IntersectionCommand, IsomorphismCommand, LayoutCommand, LoadCommand, Lval, MinimizationCommand, MinusMinus, NamesCommand, NullExpr, OmegaCommand, OpenCommand, ParityCommand, PlusPlus, PreferenceCommand, ProductCommand, PromelaCommand, PropertyCommand, QPTLCommand, ReadlineCommand, ReduceCommand, ReplaceCommand, RepositoryCommand, ReverseCommand, SatisfiabilityCommand, SaveCommand, SeparationCommand, SeqCommand, ShellExpr, SimplifyCommand, SimulatedCommand, SimulationEquivalenceCommand, SleepCommand, SolveExtension.SolveCommand, SplitCommand, StatCommand, TestCommand, TimeExpr, TranslateCommand, UnaryExpr, UnionCommand, ValidityCommand
public interface Expression

An Expression provides an interface of expressions in GOAL scripts.

Author:
Ming-Hsien Tsai
